speaker: Oath of Iron
lines: You heat the strip until the rune shows and settles.
You set it on the anvil and steady your grip.
You strike the mark and speak your oath.
You quench the piece; steam rises and fades.
The shop is quiet outside this room.
You lift the strip and feel the weight of the choice.
You made a promise to the work.
You know the smith will see it on sight.

give_item.name: Dragonsteel Maul
give_item.description: A maul that makes arguments short

give_item.name: Sigil Brand
give_item.description: Mark and unmake with heat that remembers
